title: Thai Beverage Makers Look to Warm Weather to Revive Earnings
description: For Thai beverage companies, summer can’t come fast enough. After a year of weak consumer sentiment weighing on earnings, warmer days are expected to boost the bottom lines of tea and energy drink makers.
content: For Thai beverage companies, summer can’t come fast enough. After a year of weak consumer sentiment weighing on earnings, warmer days are expected to boost the bottom lines of tea and energy drink makers.
